attributes.action: Include a box on General Election ballot papers for “No Confidence”.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit and the 2014 Scottish independence referendum being prime examples.
attributes.background: For those who are unhappy with politicians who ignore their constituents.  Rather than having a spoilt paper which is ignored, the results must be counted and declared, so Westminster and devolved Parliaments’ will know they do not speak for all of the country.
